didit_api_key.description: Didit API Key for identity verification

didit_kyc_workflow_id.description: Didit KYC Workflow ID (ID Verification + Liveness + Face Match)

gridlines_api_key.description: Gridlines API Key for Voter ID verification (India)

surepass_api_key.description: Surepass API Key for Voter ID verification (backup)

google_maps_api_key.description: Google Maps API Key for Directions API and Geocoding

kyc_provider.description: Which KYC provider to use: didit, idfy, gridlines, manual

min_face_match_score.description: Minimum face match score to pass verification (0.0 - 1.0)

bgv_required_for_online.description: Whether BGV is required to go online (false = ID verified can go online, true = BGV required)

bgv_skip_api_calls.description: Skip real BGV API calls and return mock success (for testing)

volunteer_radius_id_verified_in.description: Service radius (km) for ID-verified volunteers in India

volunteer_radius_id_verified_us.description: Service radius (miles) for ID-verified volunteers in USA

volunteer_radius_id_verified_default.description: Default service radius (km) for ID-verified volunteers

volunteer_radius_bgv_verified_in.description: Service radius (km) for BGV-verified volunteers in India

volunteer_radius_bgv_verified_us.description: Service radius (miles) for BGV-verified volunteers in USA

volunteer_radius_bgv_verified_default.description: Default service radius (km) for BGV-verified volunteers
